data.title: Children’s Bureau (CB)
data.text:
Nominations for the 2024 Adoption Excellence Awards

The Adoption Excellence Awards recognize outstanding accomplishments in achieving permanency for America's children waiting in foster care. The nomination materials for the 2024 awards are now available.

Access nomination materials

Child Maltreatment Report Released

This report includes national data about instances of child abuse and neglect known to state child protective services agencies.

View the report

2020 Child Welfare Outcomes Report Released

This Report to Congress provides information on the performance of states on seven national outcome categories and also includes data on contextual factors and findings of analyses conducted across states.

Read the report

New FY 2023 Children's Bureau Discretionary Grant Awards

View the Children’s Bureau discretionary grants awarded in fiscal year 2023. When available, each award includes a link and description of the expired Notice of Funding Opportunity, a list of the grant recipients, and a link to their project abstracts.

View the awards

Family First 5th Anniversary Celebration

HHS celebrates 5 years of the Family First Prevention Services Act through supporting families with vital resources to help keep families together.

Read the letter from CB
